pre.span: <rdf:RDF xml:base = "&oper;" xmlns:math = "&math;" xmlns:mrela= "&mrela;" xmlns:func = "&func;" xmlns:oper = "&oper;" xmlns:proc = "&proc;" xmlns:owl = "&owl;" xmlns:rdf = "&rdf;" xmlns:rdfs = "&rdfs;" xmlns:xsd = "&xsd;">
An operation is an action or procedure which produces a new value from one or more input values. [Wikipedia]
